description:
A minimalistic puzzle where you have to think before you act, one wrong move and 'Pop' chicken could get lost! She knows that there are no dangers on the farm, but things always change places, leaving her confused.

Your objective is to save your lost chicks, bringing them to the comfort of the barn, where there is a cozy chicken coop for everyone and an abundant affection from a caring mother.
name: Pop and Chicks
intro: Help Pop the hen rescue her chicks. Take one move at a time, and be careful where you're going.
